Official Speedrun.com Legal:
 Original content provided on the site is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International. Content uploaded by users, such as game cover images, are copyright of their respective owners; the same applies to content that is linked to, like YouTube videos and external images or documents.
 
 Apps whose core functionality is directly related to the site may use the domain name (speedrun.com) in their name, as long as it's not the sole name, and the app adheres to the license applicable to the content it uses. Either the app name or the description must explicitly state that the app is unofficial.
Connection error with server! Check your internet connection and try again later.
Could not load twitch player! Please try again later.
Could not load twitch app! Is it installed?
This run does not have a video.
Something went wrong running the player.
Runs will appear here as you watch them.

Thanks for downloading the app and giving it a try!
 
 Here are some useful tips while using the app:
 * If you select a Speedrun to watch, your progress is automatically recorded. Feel free to leave and come back later!
 * Filters can be used on any leaderboard. Your filter options are saved for next time.
 * You can subscribe to categories and players to be notified of a new PB/WR.
 * Charts are available for the site, games, categories/levels, and players. Just click the graph icon.
 * Want to watch speedruns on your TV? This app is available for Android TV or Amazon Fire TV (currently in beta).
 
 This project started in March 2019 out of my distaste for viewing the Speedrun.com website directly from a phone. While the site is mobile friendly, it lacks some useful features normally found on smartphones. I continue to supply bugfixes and new features for this app almost every month.
 
 If you like the app, please consider supporting my motivation by sharing or rating.

Thanks for using the app!
 
 I know its been awhile! This release was created to address some issues with the growing size of leaderboards and some player record pages. Specifically:
 * Partial loading of leaderboards which are very, very long
 * Paginated loading of player pages and regrouping
 * Server side improvements to signficiantly reduce costs and improve performance
 
 Enjoying the app? Please consider rating or sharing!
No players to show! Type into the search box to find a player by name.
Select categories/levels you want to receive notifications for new records. Choose "Select None" to unsubscribe.

I do my best to track, monitor, and resolve crashes and other app misbehavior as are observable via analytics. However, I have had a lot of difficulty resolving some issues reported on the Play Store because I have not been able to open a line of communication or receive more specific details of the issue.
 
 In order to resolve this, this project uses GitHub Issues to track problems and communicate issues. To submit an issue, you must have a GitHub account.
 
 If you choose to submit an issue, the process would be made easier if you include:
 
 * Screenshots of issues and pages around the issue, when applicable
 * A detailed overview of your session, including which games, players, and runs you may have viewed
Number of runs submitted in a time period. A potential signal of new skips or popularity level.
Tap on a list item while selected to view the run!\n \n Game completion time by world records over time. Plotted by each subcategory on the same line.

Plots all leaderboard runs on a single chart.
This chart gives a wholistic view on what a "typical" skilled time might look like what separates the seasoned runners from newbies.
The number of PBs this player has submitted for each game, displayed as a Pie wheel.
The number of verified runs recorded on the site over time.

Detailed Information about a player for each game.
Personal best times of this player charted over time
Sum of the number of days which the world record was held for a player in a category. Individual world records tend to not last for long, so this chart exposes common contenders.
